attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment unless an opposing petition is made it is not possible to easily see if other people disagree with a petition. A negative vote on a petition would give a clearer view on how much support any topic may have.

rejection.details:
Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.

However, this is addressed in the E-petitions FAQ and we have no plans to change our current position.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
